nodes.text: Illodia was the sector capital of Illodia sector and home to the Illodian culture of Humans. The Illodians colonized 20 planets in Illodia sector.
Illodia was annexed by the Galactic Empire during the New Order, which tried to eliminate the planet's ruling oligarchy by levying huge taxes while the planetary government defied its orders.
Exmoor, the estate of the Beruss family on Coruscant, was dominated by a skyscraper named the Illodia Tower, and had an artificial lake with fish imported from the planet.
